info.comment:
Here, at thsi pet store, you can (instead of making your own) get ideas and even buy from Cho's Petstore!

A full-grown dragon: 10 $

A mystery egg: 5$

A juvenile dragon: 8 $

A dragon egg: 1$

A spotted fire-cat: 10 $

A full grown griffon: 10$

A winged sea serpent (can only survive if you buy the 6-foot aquarium!): 10$

A winged mouse (lol): 5$

6-foot aquarium: 8$

8-foot training cage: 10$

10-foot outside-pet dragon cage: 10$

(that's all for now! You can have these pets just by joining, but you must have a story of how you found them. If you have something that needs training, you can buy these, or train the dragon yourself. You don't have to buy from here...it's just an option if you want to see what there is and get ideas.)
info.author: -Sprinklestar-
